doc.after: MRO contains a host of scientific instruments such as cameras spectrometers and radar which are used to analyze the landforms stratigraphy minerals and ice of Mars It paves the way for future spacecraft by monitoring daily weather and surface conditions studying potential landing sites and testing a new telecommunications system MRO s telecommunications system will transfer more data back to Earth than all previous interplanetary missions combined and MRO will serve as a highly capable relay satellite for future missions
